topic.title: Newspapers.com
topic.body: Does anyone have a Newspapers.com account they wouldn't mind sharing with others?  Or, do you know of any?  I'm a preserver and would greatly appreciate any account available.  Or, does anyone know of any newspaper torrents?

7_19sggoAZ4hcorrrfWoFWP9rwfpVsL29cnZ.body: very excited to see what will happen with ZeroNet!  This could very well be the future!
